content.rendered:
Single Vision Lens that Amplifies your Vision

Seto FD+ is an upgraded single vision lens to offer you freedom of enjoying better quality of vision, whether near or far. Every Seto FD+ lens comes with protective features that offer effective shield from scratches, water, reflection and dust,for enhanced durability.


Features



  • HD Clarity with aspheric design
  • Super hydrophobic coating
  • Protection from harmful UV radiation
  • Provides sharper perception of colour and contrast
  • Scratch resistant

Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses
